categories: Category:Empire of the Hand star systems

nodes.text: The UR-2212-GR system was a star system that was located within the galaxy's Unknown Regions. The system was home to a blue gas giant, which was orbited by a frozen moon. On the moon was an Imperial research facility that was home to a Force-sensitive cloning experiment. In 5000 BBY, a misjump caused the Harbinger to travel through time to 41 ABY. It came out of its failed hyperspace tunnel in this system, where Jedi Knight Jaden Korr and salvagers Khedryn Faal and Marr Idi-Shael had also arrived, following a Force vision of Korr's.
The UR-2212-GR system was established, albeit unnamed, in the 2010 novel Crosscurrent, written by Paul S. Kemp.
